title: What to say to a smoker
context: Politely ask someone to stop smoking near you.

content.bestLine: Could you please not smoke near me?

neutral.text: I'd appreciate it if you didn't smoke here
Could you please refrain from smoking?
I'm trying to avoid smoke, could you help?
Do you mind not smoking near me?
I'm not comfortable with smoke, thanks
I'd prefer it if you didn't smoke here
Is it okay if you don't smoke now?

informal.text: Hey, can you not smoke right now?
I'm good if you don't smoke near me
Can you take a smoke break elsewhere?
I'm trying to quit, can you not smoke?
Do me a solid and don't smoke here
I'm not a fan of smoke, can you stop?
Can you smoke outside or something?
I'd really appreciate it if you didn't smoke

formal.text: I would appreciate it if you refrained from smoking
Could you please extinguish your cigarette?
I must ask you to refrain from smoking in this area
It's our policy to maintain a smoke-free environment
I would be grateful if you could smoke elsewhere
Please be aware that smoking is not allowed here

patterns.template: I'd [option] it if you didn't smoke here
patterns.meaning: requesting someone to refrain from smoking

dialogs.description: Asking a stranger to stop smoking

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Excuse me, could you please not smoke near me?

lines.speaker: Smoker
lines.text: Oh, sorry about that. I'll go smoke somewhere else

dialogs.description: Asking a friend to stop smoking

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Hey, can you not smoke right now? I'm trying to avoid smoke

lines.speaker: Friend
lines.text: No problem, I'll take a break from smoking for a bit
